name: Boat (PnDAA)
description:
Don't forget to hit the FULL SCREEN button.

You steer a boat. You will need to navigate through the level to find a heart for your dad.  For that you will collect different fruits. Good luck!

Controls

Keyboard

Arrows or asdw: move

e: sail (on/off)

shift: motor (stay pressed)

Xbox controller

Left stick: move

X: sail (on/off)

R1 or R2: motor (stay pressed)

Credits

Development, 3D models: Matthieu Saül (twitter)

External resources:

Water shader (with tweaks)
